patterns: Any self care remedies for common cold?
How do i prevent common cold?
What to do if i have common cold
responses:
Inhale steam to relieve a stuffed nose and add few drops of eucalyptus oil in a bowl of hot water. 
 Strengthen your immune system by consuming Amla and Tulsi 
 also eat a balanced diet and get plenty rest by consuming hot beverages.

patterns: Any self care remedies for fever?
What to do if i have fever?
responses:
Use herbal kadha (ayurvedic drink prepared with several herbs and spices boiled together) of tulsi (basil). 
 You can prepare it easily by boiling some tulsi leaves with a pinch of black pepper and jaggery 
 Consume it while its still hot

Kudzu is a well established medicinal plant in ayurveda 
 and its roots help a lot in complimenting your immune system to attack the infestation of germs. 
 It is a climbing vine that belongs to the pea family. 
 You can boil a cleaned kudzu root for fifteen minutes and store it for consumption during the whole day.

Turmeric milk to deal with your viral fever. 
 The favorite herbal remedy of all the Indian mothers out there has to be turmeric milk (haldi ka doodh). 
 This powerful drink boosts your immunity and helps you heal from terrible infections in a zilch of a moment.

Dried ginger powder is another magic ingredient. 
 Ginger is also a therapeutic ingredient to help you up your immunity game. 
 Ayurveda recommends that your overall diet during a viral fever should be light, easy to digest, and full of fluids. 
 Adding spices like cumin, pepper, cinnamon can relieve symptoms of viral fever like coughing, vomiting, increased sinus, and congestion. 
 If your fever is persistent for more than 2 days, consult your physician or an ENT specialist to understand if any serious infection is the underlying cause of your viral fever.

patterns: Any self care remedies for diabetes?
What to do if i have diabetes?
responses:
Using Fenugreek seeds is effective. 
 Fenugreek seeds are ‌easily available in most of the Indian kitchens. 
 Soaking two tablespoons of fenugreek seeds in water at night, 
 and drinking with the seeds in the morning can help lower blood sugar levels.

Using Cinnamon is effective. 
 Cinnamon is a natural bioactive spice and can help maintain blood sugar levels. 
 It’s simple to consume. 
 Just add half a teaspoon of grounded cinnamon in a glass of water, stir to mix and sip it down slowly. 
 You can repeat this once a day.

Mix Aloe Vera with Buttermilk. 
 Aloe vera may be helpful in maintaining low blood sugar levels. 
 Cut a few fresh slices from aloe vera leaves and consume it with buttermilk.

Use Drumsticks. 
 The great thing about it is that it may help manage blood sugar levels. 
 Add a couple of slices to a jug of water and drink from this jug whenever thirsty.

patterns: Any self care remedies for depression?
What to do if i have depression?
responses:
If you experience some sense of dissapointment, stemming from events such as losing a job or getting divorced then you might be feeling: 
 Excessive criticism both towards the self and others, 
 Irritability, 
 Accusing others or Accusing themselves, 
 A sense of failure, 
 Anger, outrage and aggression, 
 Feeling useless, 
 Guilt, 
 Suicidal thoughts, 
 Hiding your true feelings from others. 
 To conquer this condition, rehearse relaxation techniques like breathing exercises, yoga, or meditation

If you experience a mental health disorder caused by trauma, shock or loss then you might be feeling: 
 Insomniac, 
 Unpredictable mood swings, 
 Auditory halluciantions, 
 Reduced libido, 
 Fear & Anxiety, 
 Restlessness, 
 Decreased appetite and weight loss. 
 To treat this attempt to stay away from crude food varieties, just as harsh, astringent, and impactful flavors.

If you are experiencing imbalance in your diet or lifestyle you might be feeling: 
 down, dull or sluggish, 
 Too much sleepy, 
 Staying in bed all day, 
 Negative thought patterns, 
 Having a poor outlook on life. 
 You can prevent this by circumventing sweet, salty, and sour flavors while favoring bitter, pungent, and astringent ones. 
 Moreover, it’s best to avoid heavy foods. When planning meals, enjoy three regular, small meals per day without snacking in between.

patterns: Any self care remedies for asthma?
What to do if i have asthma?
responses:
Use Honey and Cloves. 
 To strengthen the lungs, a mixture of cloves (at least 7-8) and banana needs to be kept overnight and eaten the next day. 
 Follow this up, after an hour (nothing to be consumed during the time), with a little hot water and honey. 
 This is very helpful for those suffering from chronic bronchial asthma.

Use Nightshade/Kanteli. 
 7 to 14 ml of the juice made from the whole plant or the fruits of the Yellow-berried Nightshade or Kanteli, as it’s called in Hindi, Kantakari in Sanskrit, can be consumed twice a day to relieve and ease symptoms of asthma.
Drink Herbal Tea. Herbal tea made by blending Ajwain, Tulsi, pepper, and ginger is a useful natural expectorant for asthmatics.

Involve yourself in Panchakarma. 
 Panchakarma, that involves 5 (panch) actions of therapeutic treatment (karma), is very useful for asthmatic patients. 
 It is a detoxification process that takes a person through 5 stages that involves the uses of herbs, herbal oils, medicated milk, and other Ayurvedic medicines.

Consume the herbal plant Adulsa. Aside from treating a variety of other diseases, 
 Adulsa is an Indian herb that’s been used to help control bronchitis for quite some time. 
 It’s very effective as a cough remedy and for asthmatics.

Use Cucurmin. 
 Curcumin, which is the yellow pigment that gives turmeric its colour, 
 it includes quite a few pharmacological and antioxidant components, of which, is its ability to inhibit inflammation. 
 This naturally makes it a vital herb in the fight against Bronchial asthma.

patterns: What medication should i take for fever?
What medicines to take for fever?
responses:
medicines you can consume : acetaminophen ,ibuprofen,aspirin,Crocin Cold & Flu Max, 
 prevention that you must follow :Wash your hands,Cover your mouth when you cough and your nose when you sneeze,Clean frequently used surfaces,Avoid sharing cups, glasses, and eating utensils with other people.

patterns: What medication should i take for diabetes?
What medicines to take for diabetes?
responses:
medicines you can consume : Insulin ,Amylinomimetic drug,Dipeptidyl peptidase-4 (DPP-4) inhibitor, 
 prevention that you must follow :Cut Sugar and Refined Carbs From Your Diet,Work Out Regularly,Drink Water as Your Primary Beverage,Lose Weight If You’re Overweight or Obese,Quit Smoking & Follow a Very-Low-Carb Diet,Watch Portion Sizes.

patterns: What medication should i take for depression?

responses:
medicines you can consume :  brexpiprazole, quetiapine,olanzapine, 
 prevention that you must follow :Exercise regularly, Cut back on social media time, Drink Water as Your Primary Beverage, Build strong relationships, Minimize your daily choices, Follow a Very-Low-Carb Diet.
